data.title: El Centro Campus
data.meta_description: El Centro College is now Dallas College El Centro Campus. Dallas College El Centro Campus was the first college of the district to open its doors in 1966.
data.text:
Page Content

​​​​​​​

Experience New 360° Virtual Tours of El Centro Campus

Our new 360° virtual tours offer an immersive look at the spaces that make El Centro special like the TLC cave, fitness center, and culinary arts labs.

Start Virtual Tour

El Centro Fast Facts

Achieving the Dream Institute

Texas A&M Engineering Academy

Located in Downtown Dallas

Mascot: the Eagles

10,000+students served

Welcome From the President

“El Centro is more than a name; it is a commitment. Your hopes and dreams are important to us and remain at the absolute center of our work to help you become the best version of you. On behalf of our entire campus family, we thank you for the opportunity to serve you while celebrating the milestones of your personal transformation.”

Learn more about Dr. Williams

Get Downtown Fast with Free DART Student Pass

The new Student Pass is your key to the city.

Heading to a class at one of the Dallas College campuses? How about an event downtown? Or maybe you’re catching a flight at DFW?

Get there with DART! Simply show your Student Pass using DART’s mobile app, and your trip is absolutely free.

Get your Free DART Student Pass Now

Our Signature Programs

Whether you are working toward your degree or seeking a promotion, our signature programs will prepare you for a rewarding career in a variety of fields.

Learn more about the seven unique schools that house our programs.

Culinary and Hospitality Institute

Students train alongside experienced professionals, develop dynamic skills and build strong industry connections — all at a fraction of the cost of for-profit culinary schools.

Nursing

El Centro was the first campus of Dallas College to offer a nursing program and has established relationships with several top-ranked hospitals in the Dallas area.

Fashion Marketing/Fashion Design

Our distinctive design programs offer hands-on learning with opportunities to work with trade professionals. Through specialized alliances, students have the chance to compete for scholarships and industry opportunities.

Architecture

The Architecture program provides students the opportunity to gain exposure to the wide variety of skills that architects must master.

El Centro Services and Highlights

All Student Resources and Services

Premiere Health Programs El Centro can prepare you for a rewarding, in-demand career in the health field. We offer a degree or certification in programs like: Dental Hygiene, Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI), Cardiac Sonography and more

CISCO Academy El Centro is an authorized CISCO Networking Academy, offering courses to help prepare students to take the appropriate Cisco Certified professional exams for CCNA and CCNP, Network Security and Voice over IP (VoIP)

Design Programs Our distinctive design programs, which include Architecture, Interior Design, Fashion Design and Fashion Marketing/Visual Design, offer hands-on learning and opportunities to work with trade professionals

Developing Hispanic-Serving Institutions ProjectThis campus offers a variety of free services to Hispanic students designed to boost their success.

Where We Are

El Centro Campus

801 Main St.

Dallas, TX 75202

214-860-2000

Community Partnerships

Thank you to our partners who support us in building a brighter future for our students.

For more information on ways to support, please visit Dallas College Foundation.
